class.name: prx_utilities/acrobot_as_pendulum
class.description: Looks at an acrobot and approximates distance as if it was a single-link pendulum.

class.name: prx_utilities/acrobot_task_mapping
class.description: Acrobot embedding for removing velocity terms.

class.name: prx_utilities/bullet_car_to_se2
class.description: Embeds a bullet car into SE2.

class.name: prx_utilities/position_from_rigid_body_mapping
class.description: Embeds a dynamic rigid body into xyz.

class.name: prx_utilities/bullet_manip_to_se2
class.description: Embeds a bullet manipulator into SE2.

class.name: prx_utilities/dynamic_baxter_end_effector
class.description: Embeds the Baxter arm into it's xyz end effector location. Only works with the dynamic baxter arm.

class.name: prx_utilities/pendulum_task_mapping
class.description: Pendulum embedding for removing velocity terms.

class.name: prx_utilities/rally_car_mapping
class.description: Embeds a rally car into SE2.
